item.title: Typescript study
item.description: typescript â‰ˆ javascript plus ğŸ”—setup npm install typescript -g tsc -version npm install ts-node -g ğŸ–Œï¸hello world let str = "hi" console.log(str); ts-node t.ts ğŸ–‹ï¸datatype let a1 :string ='abc' let a2:number = 2 let a3 :boolean =true let nu:null =null let un:undefined = undefined let a4:string|null = null let a5:1|2|3 = 2 any let a:any a= 1 a="1" a=true strong type let a:string = "123" a=1 Err let a:unknown a= 1 a="1" a=true let b :String if(typeof a =="string") { b=a } enum æšä¸¾ enum Color { RED,BLUE,BLACK} let color = Color.
